name: Music_1934.wav
keywords: ['low quality', 'vintage', 'northern soul', 'groovy bass', 'groovy piano melody', 'funky guitar chords', 'shimmering open hats', '4 on the floor kick', 'flat male vocal', 'melodic background male vocals', 'mono', 'warm', 'nostalgic', 'sentimental']
caption: The low quality recording features a northern soul song that consists of flat male vocals, alongside melodic male background vocals, singing over funky guitar chords, groovy piano chords, groovy bass, "4 on the floor" kick pattern and shimmering open hats. It is noisy and in mono and therefore vintage, but it also sounds warm, nostalgic and sentimental.
